name: Pokémon Battle
description:
Allow 2 minutes for the game to load—it's pretty big. If it takes too long, you can download it here and open it in your browser.

Welcome, competitive battlers.

This project is a fan-made Pokémon battle simulator, featuring:

  • 110 different Pokémon + 30 mega evos
  • 193 fully animated moves
  • Abilities, items, EVs—pretty much everything you'd expect from the battles in mainstream Pokémon games.

Face off against 35 opponents and battle your way to victory!

General instructions:
  • Click the green flag to begin, or to quit an ongoing battle. Progress will not be lost unless you refresh the tab.
  • You must choose a party of six before each battle. The roster is randomized, so you can hit the flag if you don't like the hand you're dealt.
  • After defeating an opponent, you may choose one of their Pokémon to use in the next battle (It will appear in a yellow Pokéball). This is the only way you may use megas/legendaries.
Credits:
  • This game was developed in Scratch and brought here using the TurboWarp Packager.
  • All Pokémon cries and designs are registered trademarks of Nintendo. I'm in no way affiliated.
  • Mega evo and Gen 6 sprites
  • Text engine
  • Everything else by me

Still reading? Well then, Ima go on a hunch and say you're having fun. If so, please consider donating a bit. Animating 193 attacks on my own was not easy.
